title: Revolution Pro Wrestling
overview: Revolution Pro Wrestling (RevPro/RPW) is a British professional wrestling promotion founded on August 26, 2012 by Andy Quildan after separating from International Pro Wrestling: United Kingdom. Revolution Pro Wrestling currently has partnerships with several internationally based promotions including U.S.-based Ring of Honor (ROH), Japan's New Japan Pro-Wrestling (NJPW) and Mexico's Consejo Mundial de Lucha Libre (CMLL). American independent company Global Force Wrestling (GFW), also has worked with RPW in the past. Top international wrestlers who have worked for RevPro, include WWE performers AJ Styles, Kevin Owens, Apollo Crews, Finn BÃ¡lor, Karl Anderson, Luke Gallows, Kalisto, Sami Zayn, Shinsuke Nakamura, Killian Dain, Noam Dar, Tommaso Ciampa, and Adam Cole.
